author: peters
msg: 'svnadmin load' with an ad hoc dumpfile.

author: blair
msg: Do not mark these methods with APR_INLINE, instead use the C++
inline keyword.  APR_INLINE is defined to nothing except for gcc
2.7.x or greater where it is defined as __inline__, so other
compilers miss out on an optimization, plus, this is C++, to the

author: pburba
msg: Another round of minor code and major comment improvements to merge.c.
('WHICH SVN_CLIENT_MERGE* API DO I WANT'): Note that svn_client_merge_peg
can be used when no -c or -r are specified.
string improvements, typo fixes, and the like.
(get_mergeinfo_paths): Improve doc string, remove unneeded ctx argument.
get_mergeinfo_paths().  Delete duplicate assignment to range.start.

author: rhuijben
msg: Create a SVN_ERR_ATOMIC_INIT_FAILURE error instead of a SVN_ERR_FS_GENERAL
